channel.title: Wall Street Journal The Sports Retort
channel.description: Hear the Journal's sports team's take on the most important topics and events in sports each week.

item.title: The Sports Retort, Nov. 20, 2014
item.description: We discuss the art of moving baseball fences, Kevin Harvick's theory on eating pancakes before driving and how "Frozen on Ice" is mostly pummeling NBA and NHL teams.
